resources.string: Touch & hold the Send button, then drag up. Just like magic, some emoji will come to life. To send, just let go.
Flag offensive content from the Google Assistant
Send feedback for the Google Assistant
"Cancel asset download for the 'amazed face rays' effect"
Update what the Assistant knows about you
To see profile info for %s, get the app first
To see Assistant settings, get the app first
"To see profile information for %s, you'll need to update the Google app"
To see Assistant settings, update the app first
Touch and hold to record a message.
Touch and hold to record audio
Problem while recording audio. Try again later.

"New! Transcripts let you read voice messages. Turn off in Settings.
"
Showing instructions on how to send an animated emoji.
Here is your avatar. In the next step we’ll ask for feedback.
Your feedback will help us improve the quality of our algorithm.
If applicable, which features were not accurate?
How well does the drawing resemble you?
Keep chats private with end-to-end encryption, expiring messages and discreet notifications
Kept private with end-to-end encryption, expiring messages and discreet notifications
%1$s has started an Incognito chat with %2$s
"- You won’t be able to chat with each other one to one - You won’t be able to create group chats with this person, but you’ll still see their chats from groups that you’re both in"
"It looks like you haven't blocked anyone"
"You've blocked this person. To chat, unblock them."
Choose whether you want to share results from your Assistant in chat
Cancel asset download for confused-question-marks effect
To use the camera, exit multi-window mode
Looks like you need to give access to your camera first
Cancel asset download for shocked breaking-news effect
Switch between front-facing and rear-facing camera
Problem while taking photo. Try again later.
Double-tap to take photo burst, or touch and hold to take video
Cancel asset download for Bollywood zoom effect
Unable to add this user to the group chat.
This will change for you and %s
To use Drive, connect your Google account first
You can also manage Google Drive backups below.
Back up daily on your device.
Are you sure that you want to delete your backups?
Failed to prepare a Google Drive backup.
Failed to create a Google Drive backup.
Backing up to Google Drive – %1$s of %2$s
Failed to create a local backup.
All media is backed up to Google Drive
%d media types are backed up to Google Drive
Any attachments that you send or receive can be backed up
%s are backed up to Google Drive
%s is backed up to Google Drive
%1$s, %2$s and %3$s are backed up to Google Drive
%1$s and %2$s are backed up to Google Drive
Data charges may apply if this is off
Receive alerts for trending topics and group chat ideas
This deletes all messages and lets %s forget your info.
"%1$s won't work unless you enable Google Play services."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are missing from your device."
%1$s is having trouble with Google Play services. Please try again.
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are not supported by your device."
"%1$s won't run unless you update Google Play services."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are currently updating."
New version of Google Play services needed. It will update itself shortly.
"For Googlers and approved testers only. Don't discuss this app with people outside Google."
"Receive alerts about what's new with your contacts and friends"
To start chatting, add some friends
Strike up a chat and it will be shown here
Looks like that chat has been deleted
You and %s should have the same code. Check to make sure that they match.
To verify this chat, make sure that you and %s can see the same code
Replace your existing theme for clearer text visibility in chats
Storage space is low. Some data may be lost.
"Deleting is permanent and can't be undone."
Visit allo.google.com/web on your computer and scan the QR code to start chatting. ^1

"To chat on the web, your computer needs access to your Allo contacts & chats.
For your security, only scan codes shown on allo.google.com/web."
Allow access to your contacts & chats
"You won't be able to chat on Allo from any of the computers listed"
"You won't be able to chat on Allo from this computer"
Check your connection and try again
Not a valid code. Try refreshing.
Enjoy high-quality video and audio calls at any time
"You'll both enjoy high-quality video and audio calls at any time"
"%s is already on Duo! Get the app for high-quality video and audio calls at any time"
To use Allo, enter your number
To take a photo, allow access to your camera
To share media, give access to your device’s storage
To share where you are, give access to your location
Enable live camera previews in your chats
Let Google show voice message transcripts
Something went wrong. Tap the effect to try again.
Before you start chatting, make sure that you trust %s. Anyone you chat with can see your public profile info.
Delete sticker set %1$s? You can create it again later.
Your stickers are ready. Tap any chat to send.
"Capture button: Hold the camera at arm's length and take a selfie"
To start chatting, tap the Message icon
Take a selfie and we’ll auto-magically generate a sticker pack in your likeness. For best results, keep your expression neutral.
"Oops, we can't reach the Allo servers. Please check that you're connected to the Internet and then try again."
Problem while starting chat. Try again later.
Unable to unregister. Please check the connection and try again
Sorry, the file cannot be found on your device.
"I've just sent over %s, but if you're on an older version of Allo, you might not be able to open it. Check for an update."
Tap to meet your Google Assistant
To record & send messages, allow access to your mic in Settings
"To send or receive media, give access to your device's storage"
To back up your chats, give access to your device’s storage
Failed message from %1$s: %2$s. Time: %3$s. In group: %4$s.
Either the link has been reset or the chat no longer exists
Sorry, unable to fetch the link. Please try again later
"Looks like you've been banned from the group"
To protect the privacy of this group chat, you can reset the invitation link at any time. This will create a new link and disable the old one.
Sorry, unable to reset the link. Please try again later
Anyone with the link can join
Problem with joining the chat. Please try again later.
Join our group chat on Allo :) %s
"As you're not in this group any more, you can't send or receive messages"
Problem while updating group. Try again later.
Images may be subject to copyright.
Sorry, the image cannot be found on your device.
"You can't send messages to this chat because keys are out of sync."
Get contact card shared by the other participant
Get file shared by the other participant
"Any edits that you've made will be lost"
Your photo will be discarded and any edits will be lost
Emoji %s has been added to the canvas.
Sticker %s has been added to the canvas.
Web sticker added to the canvas.
Check licensing rules before you share.
Number not valid. Check it and re-enter.
"I'm chatting on Google Allo. Try it with me! %s"
"Let's get onto Allo. Use this link so that we can chat. %s"
Do you want to chat with me on Allo? We can also try out the Google Assistant. Get it here: %s
Add me on Google Allo to chat. You can use this link: %s
Add me on Allo to chat. You can use this link: %s
"Let's chat on Allo, and let's try out the Google Assistant. Get it here: %s"
Message me on Allo. Get it here: %s

To add this person to your group, you can:

Chat now free of charge via Google SMS

"Leaving will also delete your chat history. You can't rejoin, edit or delete any group activities unless you're invited back."
Gives you a more personalised Allo experience by using your Google account info
Click to see location in maps
"Allo has been activated on another device, so you won't see any messages on this one"
Take a photo or capture video
"Take some photos and they'll be shown here"
Problem while getting location. Try again later.
Heart – tap to like the message
Heart – tap to unlike the message
Play when sending and receiving messages
"Can't translate message. Check your connection & try again."
"You are deleting the group's data for the selected activities. Are you sure?"
There was an error. Please try again.
"This activity isn't supported in landscape orientation."
Send a file to the group
Send a location to the group
"Can't open that activity at the moment. Check back later."
"You'll be prompted to invite friends via SMS. Operator fees may apply."
"Couldn't load your contacts. To invite them, try again."
Receive updates about shiny new features and fun content
"To let Allo fetch new messages automatically, turn on 'Unrestricted data usage' in Settings"
New message delayed – tap to view
"Allo wasn't able to display a new message in time. Please send feedback to report the problem."
"You won't receive notifications for any new messages."
"Notifications have been disabled in systems settings. You won't receive any alerts for new messages when this setting is off"
Some messages not sent in Allo
"You won't receive any alerts for new messages when this setting is off"
Get alerts when conversation codes change
Your Google Assistant is ready to help. Tap below to try it.
Tap here to finish Allo sign-up
Finish signing up to start chatting
Finish sign-up and ask Google anything, directly in your chats
Finish sign-up to send personalised stickers
Edit the personalised sticker that you sent.
Edit the photo that you sent.

"Something isn't right. Check back later.
To leave feedback, go to Help in the main menu."
Sorry, unable to fetch the QR code. Please try again later
Not a valid Allo QR code
To protect your privacy, you can reset this QR code at any time. This will create a new QR code and disable the old one.
Sorry, unable to reset the QR code. Please try again later
To start chatting, tap at any time
"Sorry, this number can't be found on Allo"
Take a selfie for your profile
Ready to join? Centre the Allo code to scan
Try again with an Allo QR code
Tap and hold to record video
"Swipe up to expand Double tap to flip camera"
"You can't send messages to this chat."
Your recent emojis will be shown here

By signing up, you agree to the Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy. You also agree to let Allo send your contacts and location to Google periodically, and to let the Google Assistant share your location with friends in group chats. People with your number can connect with you across Google services.

By signing up, you agree to the Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy. You also agree to let Allo send your contacts and location to Google periodically, and to let the Google Assistant share your location with friends in group chats. People with your number can connect with you across Google services and see your Allo profile.
Internet connection required to verify your number
Invalid code. Please verify the PIN or get a new one.
"You'll get a code via SMS. Operator rates may apply."
%s will be removed from this group and unable to join the group again.
Allo needs access to your contacts, device storage and SMS verification code. This makes it even easier to connect.
To get going, give Allo access

"Restore your chats now to make sure that you don't lose them if you ever switch devices.
If you don't do this now, you won't be able to restore them later."
There was a problem while searching for previous Allo chats. Please try again.

"There was a problem while restoring your old chats. Please try again.
If you don't do this now, you won't be able to restore them later."
Your chats are now safe and sound. Your attachments will continue to be restored in the background.
Failed to find old Allo chats.
"This site may be harmful. Proceed anyway? "Learn more
"To add someone to Allo, get friends to scan this code"
"To add someone to the group, ask them to scan this code"
Results may be incomplete at the moment
Problem while cropping photo. Try again later.
Problem while using selected photo. Try again later.
Problem while updating profile. Try again later.
Your public profile is visible to people who have your contact info. Learn more
Take a selfie for your profile
Looks like the file is too big. To share it, make sure that your file is less than %1$s.
"You'll miss out on trending topics & group chat ideas"
Turn off notifications for chat suggestions?
"You'll miss out on updates with contacts & friends"
Turn off notifications for contact updates?
"You'll miss out on updates on shiny new features & fun content"
"Turn off notifications for what's new in Allo?"
"You won't get any more reminders on messages that you might have missed"
Turn off notifications for smart reminders?
Receive notifications about unread messages and chats that you might have missed
"Can't record audio at the moment. Please try again later."
"Can't record audio due to network connectivity."
These people are on Allo too! Start chatting
Reorder sticker sets. Double-tap and hold to change which sets are shown first in chats.
Drag to choose which stickers are shown first in chats
"Add some and they'll be shown here."
Be even more expressive. Recent stickers will be shown here.
Enjoy your Eyck stickers. Tap to share.
Delete sticker set %s? You can download it again later.
That set is unavailable at the moment.
Failed to download. Tap to retry.
"^1 Turn on to remove & ban people, edit group name and photo, and give others admin rights"
Mix it up! Try a new theme at any time.
Find the perfect one for everyone in this conversation
There was an error. Please try again.
"You don't have the admin rights to make that change"
%1$s has reset the invitation link. The old one will no longer work.
"You've reset the invitation link. The old one will no longer work."
%1$s removed the group name and changed the photo
"You've removed the group name and changed the photo"
%1$s removed the group name and photo
"You've removed the group name and photo"
%1$s changed the group name and photo
"You've changed the group name and photo"
%1$s changed the group name and removed the photo
"You've changed the group name and removed the photo"
"%1$s is on Duo and wants you to join too! You'll get to make video and audio calls"
Add me on Duo so that we can video chat. Use this link: http://g.co/getduo
%1$s joined this group via a link
You joined this group via a link
"%1$s is installing Duo and wants you to join too! You'll get to make video and audio calls"
"I'm installing Duo! Add me on Duo so that we can video chat. Use this link: http://g.co/getduo"
%1$s is installing Duo. Once both of you have it, tap the Duo icon up top to make a call.
"I'm installing Duo! Add me on Duo so that we can video chat."
"You're installing Duo. Once both of you have it, tap the Duo icon up top to make a call."

"• You’ll be removed from any groups. • Allo chats will be permanently deleted from your devices. • Chat backups (device & Google Drive) will also be deleted. • Your chats with the Google Assistant will remain intact."
"Better, faster and more fun. Don't miss out – get the upgrade."
To keep getting messages from Allo, upgrade now
Sorry, the video cannot be found on your device.
The poll will stop for everyone and results will be shared
You changed your vote from %1$s to %2$s
Hold and drag up and down to resize text
Showing instructions on how to whisper or shout a message.
"1. Type something 2. Touch & hold the Send button 3. Drag up or down to adjust the text size"
